headline: Trump Administration Says It's Not Looking to Take Stakes in TSMC, Micron
summary: Unlike Intel, Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and Micron may not be required to give up stakes in exchange for their CHIPS Act grants, following some signs of pushback in early talks.

raw.headline: Trump Administration Says It's Not Looking to Take Stakes in TSMC, Micron
raw.summary: Unlike Intel, Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company and Micron may not be required to give up stakes in exchange for their CHIPS Act grants, following some signs of pushback in early talks.

headline: Micron Technology and Albany have been highlighted as Zacks Bull and Bear of the Day

headline: Bull of the Day: Micron Technology (MU)
